(Simplified: 痫)
Chinese Definition:
Pictophonetic: 閒 indicates the sound; 疒 (sickness) conveys the meaning.
  • ⿸ Surround from upper left
    • 疒 [ nè ] sickness, disease
    • 閒 [ xián ] leisure, idle time; tranquil, peaceful, calm
①俗稱羊癇風、羊癲風、羊角風。中樞神經系統的一種疾病。患此病的人，常突然倒地，口吐涎沫，手足痙攣，口裏發出羊豕的叫聲。［例］心脈滿大，癇瘛筋攣。——《素問》。［合］癇眩(因癲癇發作而眩暈)。
(Simplified: 痫)

癇字的基本解释

癇
xián
同“痫”。

癇字的汉语字典释义

[①]［xián］
［《廣韻》户閒切，平山，匣。］
亦作“癎1”。“痫1”的繁体字。
癫痫。通称羊痫风或羊角风。

癇字的康熙字典解释

【午集中】【疒字部】　癇； 康熙笔画：17； 页码：页780第38
【唐韻】戸閒切【集韻】【韻會】何閒切，?音閒。【說文】病也。【玉篇】小兒瘨病。【正字通】癇有風熱，有驚邪，皆兼虛與痰。方書：小兒有五癇，五臟，各有畜所屬。心癇，其聲如羊。肝癇，其聲如犬。脾癇，其聲如牛。肺癇，其聲如雞。腎癇，其聲如豬。發則卒然倒仆，口眼相引，手足搐搦，口吐涎沫，食頃乃甦。【後漢·王符傳】哺乳多則主癇病。

epilepsy. Commonly known as sheep epileptic wind or horn wind.
epilepsy
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Afternoon Concentration] [Department of Sui Characters] 　 Epilepsy; Kangxi Strokes: 17; Page Number: Page 780 38
[Tang Yun] Xian Xian [Ji Yun] [Yun Hui] How Xian Xian,? Sound Xian. [Said Wen] Illness. [Jade articles] Pediatric scum disease. 【Zhengzitong】Epilepsy has wind-heat, shocking evil, both of which are deficiency and phlegm. Fang Shu: Children have five epilepsy and five internal organs, each of which belongs to animals. Epilepsy, its voice is like sheep. Liver epilepsy, its voice is like a dog. Splenic epilepsy, its voice is like a cow. Pulmonary epilepsy, its voice is like a chicken. Kidney epilepsy, its voice is like a pig. When hair is made, you fall down suddenly, your mouth and eyes are attracted, your hands and feet are twitched, the mouth is salivating, and the food is nothing but Su. [Later Han·Wang Fu Chuan] Many breast-feeding causes epilepsy.
